about_the_game:
Galactic-a-Tactic: The Most Diplomatic Solution is a 3D isometric, casual fighting game where intergalactic leaders from diverse planets clash in a galaxy-spanning war. Battle across unique landscapes, featuring diverse characters and dynamic environments. Brawl, and survive in this spectacle of chaos!

Engage in intense skirmishes across a variety of maps. Visit the Frontier Capitol, the jewel of the Nova Stellaris Zone, where the stakes are as high, and navigate through the treacherous Trapsite-1, a perilous abandoned space station filled with industrial traps and hazards that test even the most skilled leaders.

With an array of unique characters, and even more unique perks, every match promises to be a thrilling test of strategy and reflexes. Adapt to the dynamic environments, outsmart your opponents, and prove your dominance in the ultimate interstellar showdown.

Whether you're a seasoned fighter or a casual player, Galactic-a-Tactic offers an exhilarating experience that combines tactical depth with fast-paced action. Are you ready to take on the galaxy and emerge victorious?

name: Galactic-A-Tactic: The Most Diplomatic Solution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10; 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5-6500, or Amd Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Battle across unique landscapes, with diverse characters and dynamic environments; brawl, and survive in this spectacle of chaos!
